Html:
Is it possible to get the Wrath of Air totem added as a buff for the tree models. I find the heavy emphasis on haste given in the tree model to be misleading. As per a few posts on EJ forums, with 5/5 GoTE and Wrath of Air Totem, we only need 325 haste to hit the 1 second GCD cap. Considering I cast far far more instnat heals than I do long cast times, I'm not as worried about having ridiculously low cast time on regrowth as I am say about it and other spells critting more often.Â  I think at least giving us the Wrath of Air Totem as a buff option will help somewhat with the modeling.

Dev~
I try to get this into the next release, but i haven't much spare time atm..
